hints.content:
The tree farmer planted $\tealE{28}$ trees in March and $\goldE{27}$ trees in April.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/9c56027b41e411e1c96c9e810d0ac3adbe8a837b)

$\tealE{28} + \goldE{27} = \maroonD{55}$

There were $\blueE{40}$ trees planted in May.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/bd9acf91b9b46d5e562bfb7c7d01fcbd14a318ec)

$\maroonD{55} + \blueE{40} = \purpleD{95}$

There were $\purpleD{95}$ total trees planted.

question.content:
A farmer plants $28$ trees in March, $27$ trees in April, and $40$ trees in May.  

**How many total trees did the farmer plant?**  

[[☃ numeric-input 1]] trees
